pkgmetadata.longdescription: Parametric Estimation in Mixed-Effects Stochastic Differential Equations // Parametric estimation in stochastic differential equations with random effects in the drift, or in the diffusion or both. Approximate maximum likelihood methods are used. M. Delattre, V. Genon-Catalot and A. Samson (2012) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9469.2012.00813.x M. Delattre, V. Genon- Catalot and A. Samson (2015) doi:10.1051/ps/2015006 M. Delattre, V. Genon-Catalot and A. Samson (2016) doi:10.1016/j.jspi.2015.12.003.
